Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/ 55th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 51st, Damen, 59th and Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/ 55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 51st, Damen, 59th and Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/ 55th.

Allow extra travel time.
